data.enText: a mass of snow, ice and rock that falls down the side of a mountain

data.chText: 在一场雪崩中被摧毁的高山村庄
data.enText: alpine villages destroyed in an avalanche

data.chText: 我们在登出广告后收到了雪片般飞来的大批答复信件。
data.enText: We received an avalanche of letters in reply to our advertisement.

tr: a sudden appearance of an overwhelming number of things
example: the program brought an avalanche of mail

tr: a slide of large masses of snow and ice and mud down a mountain
gather into a huge mass and roll down a mountain, of snow

value.def: An avalanche is a large mass of snow that falls down the side of a mountain.
You can refer to a very large quantity of things that all arrive or happen at the same time as an avalanche of them.

example.ex: The newcomer was greeted with an avalanche of publicity.
example.tran: 新来者受到了广泛的关注。
